title: Horrible Ping
body: I have had ping around 42 and then all of the sudden after this most recent match any ranked game I play my ping is now 150-2000 the game lags so hard. It cost me matches and a lot of deaths. I have tried reconnecting my router and restarting the game nothing seems to work any explanation as to why?

replies.body: Ouch that's a high and sudden spike!  This could be packet loss, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on some of these impacted games to get a better overview of your specific issue.  Let me know what you find!
